**Last updated:** `r Sys.Date()`

The GWAS summary statistics corresponding to @fgfi_ng_2012 are provided by the [Meta-Analyses of Glucose and Insulin-related traits Consortium (MAGIC)](http://www.magicinvestigators.org/downloads/).

The basic information about these datasets is available [here](ftp://ftp.sanger.ac.uk/pub/magic/MAGIC_Manning_et_al_README.pdf).  

The following analyses have been performed on BMI-adjusted Fasting Glucose (FGadjBMI) 2012 dataset.

- GSEA Round 1 (Section \@ref(fg2012-1))
